topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Deploy the KVM Region Patch 6

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p:
You must install the following patches before installing this patch:
KVM Region Custom Patch ()
PCI Bus Patch ()
KVM Custom Patch 3 ()
KVM Custom Patch 4 ()
KVM Custom Patch 5 ()
section.note: You can use the Horizon UI to see if the patch has been deployed. Select the regionkvm, then click Admin, then System, and Inventory. Click the Patches table for the patches. Or use the CLI on the active KVM controller: sudo sw-patch query.

section.title: Start the patch download
section.p: To download the patch you need from the Software Updates and Licensing site, shown above:

ol.li: Select the required patch file (e.g. ) from the Downloads list and then click Download.

Un-tar the downladed files (compressed patch files with extension tar.gz and .tar) until the TS_HP_15_Custom_PATCH_0006.patch and readme files are available.The Software Licensing site lists and displays patch file names individually for all the three versions of HCG ( HCG_1.1, HCG_2.0 and HCG_2.1) under Software Specification and Download filename. Regardless of their version number, these files are referencing the same files as extracted in the readme.

Check if the MD5 checksum verification file is extracted along with the patch file.
For validating the integrity of the downloaded file, you can run the MD5 checksum verification on the downloaded patch file and verify if the fingerprint of the file matches the version available on the server.
